text: "Solitaire" is a 1972 song by Neil Sedaka. It was taken from his 1972 album Solitaire/Neil Sedaka. The song became a hit for Andy Williams in 1973. It is the title track to his 31st studio album Solitaire. This version went to number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in South Africa, number 3 in Ireland and number 18 in New Zealand. The song was also a hit in 1975 for The Carpenters. It was taken from their sixth studio album Horizon. Their version went to number 17 in the United States, number 32 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in Canada and number 6 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Neil Sedaka songs Category:Petula Clark songs Category:The Searchers (band) songs Category:The Carpenters songs Category:Andy Williams songs Category:Sheryl Crow songs Category:Westlife songs Category:Shirley Bassey songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs Category:Elvis Presley songs
title: Solitaire (Neil Sedaka song)
